issue.title: www.xfinity.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.xfinity.com/mobile/my-account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.xfinity.com%2Fmobile%2Fmy-account%2Flogin) ### Comment > When attempting to use Xfinity Mobile with Adguard on, the site won't load it just keeps flipping back and forth between https://www.xfinity.com/mobile/my-account/login?code=0.ac.e1.ZsKnlO and https://oauth.xfinity.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=dss-mcxw-prod&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.xfinity.com%2Fmobile%2Fmy-account%2Flogin&response_type=code. > > I paused AdGuard, logged in, and no matter which page I'm on in the Xfinity mobile website, if AdGuard is on it keeps doing this same "reload reload reload reload" thing switching back and forth between multiple URLs. Then once I pause AdGuard the site works but instead of loading the page I was on, it sends me back to the login page. > > Here's another: > https://oauth.xfinity.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=dss-mcxw-prod&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.xfinity.com%2Fmobile%2Fmy-account%2Flogin&response_type=code Username: `@Anonymous` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://discord.com/login?redirect_to=%2Foauth2%2Fauthorize%3Fresponse_type%3Dcode%26client_id%3D493224032167002123%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fdiscords.com%252Fauth%252Fdiscord%252Fcallback%26scope%3Dguilds%2Bidentify%2Bguilds.join%26state%3DPNaSf2TnXChBEhvloLjtNXhRsPEMhu](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.com%2Flogin%3Fredirect_to%3D%252Foauth2%252Fauthorize%253Fresponse_type%253Dcode%2526client_id%253D493224032167002123%2526redirect_uri%253Dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fdiscords.com%25252Fauth%25252Fdiscord%25252Fcallback%2526scope%253Dguilds%252Bidentify%252Bguilds.join%2526state%253DPNaSf2TnXChBEhvloLjtNXhRsPEMhu) ### Comment > И сайт и приложение дискорда блокируется при включенном adguard. Используется обход блокировки для рф (https://github.com/bol-van/zapret-win-bundle). Интересно то, что пару недель назад все работало нормально. Сначала думал на днс, отключил в adguard фильтрацию dns, но не помогло. Добавил в роутере открытые dns Cloudflare DNS (1.1.1.1, 1.0.0.1), но при включенном adguard не работает ни сайт ни приложение. Как только отключаю adguard сразу начинает грузиться и сайт и приложение. Username: `@https://github.com/6epcepkep` ### Screenshots

AdGuard for Android

Missed ads or ad leftovers

Firefox

https://dl.hdslb.com/mobile/latest/android64/iBiliPlayer-bili.apk?t=20241110

||httpdns.bilivideo.com

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282
